name: Scribble Platformer - 5 Hours
description:
I decided to challenge myself by making a game within 5 hours and this is the result. It's very short but I like the result a lot.

Art - https://www.kenney.nl/assets/scribble-platformer

Font - https://fontstruct.com/fontstructions/show/559494/bit5x3

Sound FX Tool - https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone
